span.style: line-height: 14.772px; font-family: Arial; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Welcome to the home of Evergreen Local Schools. We are dedicated to our students, our most valuable resource. We respect all individuals in our school and community and appreciate that each person has a unique purpose. We recognize the unlimited potential in every student and empower students to make responsible decisions. We strive to develop strong character in each student and promote empathy and compassion for others. We value family and community and are committed to the safety of our students.

span.style: line-height: 14.772px; font-family: Arial; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

br.em: Building on Tradition, Committed to Excellence, Cultivating the Future
Creating innovative pathways that empower students to positively impact the world
